roleset.name: kill
roleset.note: EXECUTE-V NOTES: This sentence is beautifully ambiguous, but I've chosen thisinterpretation. (from execute.01-v)
EXECUTION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to 'execute.01' Vn class murder-42.1. Fn class execution. Framed by Katie. (from execution.01-n)

example.name: all args
example.text: John executed the criminal with his umbrella.

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: the execution of mass-murderer Ted Bundy

example.name: Arg 0
example.text: The last federal execution before the Supreme Court 's 1972 ruling banning the death penalty
example.arg: before the Supreme Court 's 1972 ruling banning the death penalty

example.name: One more arg 1
example.text: The execution of six British commandos in WWII

roleset.name: enact
roleset.note: EXECUTE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'execute' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class murder-42.1, other framed members include kill. That's only one of two senses. Comparison with kill and do. (from execute.02-v predicate notes)
EXECUTION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to 'execute.02' No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from execution.02-n)

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: Mr. Allen's Pittsburgh firm, Advanced Investment Management Inc., executes program trades for institutions.
example.arg: Mr. Allen's Pittsburgh firm, Advanced Investment Management Inc.,

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: the president 's execution of the law

example.name: Args 0 in a PP
example.text: The execution of contracts by foreign investment enterprises
